targets.rawSql: SELECT "time", n_containers || '/' || n_containers_running as running FROM docker ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1

-- SELECT "time", interface, bytes_sent FROM net WHERE interface NOT IN ('all') ORDER BY "time" ASC
-- SELECT "time", bytes_sent - LAG(bytes_sent) OVER (ORDER BY "time") AS bytes_sent_diff FROM net WHERE interface NOT IN ('all', 'eth0') ORDER BY "time" DESC
-- SELECT time, interface, bytes_sent, bytes_recv from net ORDER BY time DESC

SELECT "time", interface, bytes_sent - lag(bytes_sent, 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY interface ORDER BY "time") AS bytes_tx
FROM net WHERE interface NOT IN ('all', 'lo')
ORDER BY "time" ASC

-- SELECT "time", interface, bytes_recv *-1 as bytes_recv FROM net WHERE interface NOT IN ('all') ORDER BY "time" DESC 
-- SELECT "time", (bytes_recv - LAG(bytes_recv) OVER (ORDER BY "time")) * -1  AS bytes_recv_diff FROM net WHERE interface NOT IN ('all') ORDER BY "time" DESC
-- SELECT "time", interface, (bytes_recv * -1) as bytes_recv FROM net WHERE interface NOT IN ('all') ORDER BY "time" ASC

SELECT "time", interface, (bytes_recv - lag(bytes_recv, 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY interface ORDER BY "time")) * -1 AS bytes_rx
FROM net WHERE interface NOT IN ('all', 'lo')
ORDER BY "time" ASC

SELECT
  substring(version() from 'PostgreSQL ([0-9]+\.[0-9]+)') AS postgres,
  extversion AS timescaledb
FROM pg_extension
WHERE extname = 'timescaledb';

SELECT
  substring(version() from 'PostgreSQL ([0-9]+\.[0-9]+)') AS postgres,
  extversion AS timescaledb
FROM pg_extension
WHERE extname = 'timescaledb';

SELECT pg_database_size('postgres')
-- SELECT pg_size_pretty(pg_database_size('postgres'))
SELECT "time", uptime FROM system WHERE uptime IS NOT NULL ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT hypertable_name, hypertable_size(format('%I.%I', hypertable_schema, hypertable_name)::regclass) as size_in_mb, approximate_row_count(hypertable_schema || '.' || hypertable_name) as rows, compression_enabled as compressed, num_chunks as chunks
FROM timescaledb_information.hypertables;
SELECT "time", usage_active as CPU_use, cpu FROM cpu WHERE usage_active IS NOT NULL AND cpu = 'cpu-total' ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT time, (100 - available_percent) as memory FROM mem WHERE available_percent IS NOT NULL ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT time, path, used_percent FROM disk WHERE used_percent IS NOT NULL AND path = '/' ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
-- select * from disk
SELECT "time", host, (swap_total - swap_free) as swap_used FROM mem ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT "time", host FROM mem LIMIT 50

SELECT
  relname AS table_name,
  pg_size_pretty(pg_total_relation_size(relid)) AS table_size
FROM
  pg_stat_user_tables
ORDER BY
  pg_total_relation_size(relid) DESC;
SELECT "time", cpu, usage_active as active FROM cpu WHERE cpu = 'cpu-total' ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT "time", total, available FROM mem WHERE total IS NOT NULL ORDER BY time DESC

SELECT
  time,
  device::text AS "metric",
  AVG(used) AS "used"
FROM disk
WHERE $__timeFilter(time) AND device NOT IN ('iCloud', 'Home', 'Dropbox')
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1
SELECT "time", path, total FROM disk WHERE path = '/' ORDER BY "time" DESC
SELECT "time", (swap_total - swap_free) as swap_used FROM mem ORDER BY "time" ASC
SELECT "time", swap_total FROM mem ORDER BY "time" ASC

-- SELECT "time", container_name, usage_percent as cpu FROM docker_container_cpu ORDER BY "time" ASC 

SELECT
  time_bucket('$__interval', "time") as "time",
  container_name,
  avg(usage_percent) AS cpu_usage
FROM docker_container_cpu
WHERE
  time >= $__timeFrom() AND time <= $__timeTo()
GROUP BY
  time_bucket('$__interval', "time"),
  container_name
ORDER BY
  "time" ASC

-- SELECT time, container_name, usage_percent FROM docker_container_mem ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT
  time_bucket('$__interval', "time") as "time",
  container_name,
  avg(usage) AS mem_usage
FROM docker_container_mem
WHERE
  time >= $__timeFrom() AND time <= $__timeTo()
GROUP BY
  time_bucket('$__interval', "time"),
  container_name
ORDER BY
  "time" ASC

-- SELECT time, container_name, usage_percent FROM docker_container_mem ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT
  time_bucket('15s', "time") as "time",
  container_name,
  avg(usage_percent) AS mem_usage
FROM docker_container_mem
WHERE
  time >= $__timeFrom() AND time <= $__timeTo()
GROUP BY
  time_bucket('15s', "time"),
  container_name
ORDER BY
  "time" ASC

SELECT
  time,
  device::text AS "metric",
  AVG(used_percent) AS "used"
FROM disk
WHERE $__timeFilter(time) AND device NOT IN ('iCloud', 'Home', 'Dropbox')
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1
SELECT "time", path, total FROM disk WHERE path = '/' ORDER BY "time" DESC
SELECT "time", usage_active as cpu_, cpu FROM cpu WHERE usage_active IS NOT NULL AND cpu = 'cpu-total' ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT time, (100 -available_percent) as memory FROM mem WHERE available_percent IS NOT NULL ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT time, path, used_percent as disk FROM disk WHERE used_percent IS NOT NULL AND path = '/' ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
